mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = any(select member_id from ticket where cinema_showing_id = any(select cinema_showing_id from cinema_showing where movie_id = #{movie_id}))

select ticket.ticket_id, movie.movie_id, movie.title_ko, movie.poster_img, movie.g_rate_id, cinema.cinema_name, cinema_seat.theater, cinema_showing.showing_date, cinema_showing.showing_time, ticket.youth_count, ticket.adult_count, ticket.seat, ticket.total_price, ticket.payment, ticket.state, ticket.ticket_date from ticket inner join cinema_showing on ticket.cinema_showing_id = cinema_showing.cinema_showing_id inner join cinema_seat on cinema_showing.cinema_seat_id = cinema_seat.cinema_seat_id inner join cinema on cinema_seat.cinema_id = cinema.cinema_id inner join movie on cinema_showing.movie_id = movie.movie_id where member_id = #{id} order by ticket_date desc
select * from movie where opening_date <= now() and closing_date >= now()
select * from cinema order by cinema_name asc

select cinema_showing_id, cinema_seat_id, showing_time from cinema_showing where movie_id = (select movie_id from movie where title_ko = #{title_ko}) and cinema_seat_id = any(select cinema_seat_id from cinema_seat where cinema_id = (select cinema_id from cinema where cinema_name = #{cinema_name})) and showing_date = #{showing_date}
select seat from ticket where cinema_showing_id = #{cinema_showing_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ticket(member_id, cinema_showing_id, youth_count, adult_count, seat, total_price) value(#{member_id}, #{cinema_showing_id}, #{youth}, #{adult}, #{seat}, #{price})
